author: jdcasey
msg: - Correcting it0095 to reflect what was actually fixed in MNG-2006, i.e. scm URLs and POM url, -NOT- distributionManagement URL.
- Adding it0128 which tests the fix for MNG-3134, i.e. the parent-based calculation of DistributionManagement Site URL.
